attributes.additional_details:
Keep England English!
When immigrants enter our country they should abide by our laws or be stripped of there citizenship and deported immediately.

English should be made the upmost 1st language as should be Christianity be the 1st religion.

Churches should not be allowed to be converted to mosques

should not be allowed to wear non religion based clothing in public sector work

Immigrants should not be allowed any form of benefit or healthcare!

Immigrants should have a beneficial degree or work sector to gain citizenship!!

Immigrants should be placed under British citizens on the housing list!

Immigrants should show they can support themselves for over 3 year before citizenship is approved!! Allowing them to look for work after the 1st year leaving them to support themselves for the 1st

British citizens come 1st!

We pay taxes for a better England not to support and feed immigrants!!!!!
